responses: Hi there, nice to meet you!

I am a recent graduate with a diverse background in computer science, business, and data analytics/machine learning. My current focus is on web development, data analytics, and machine learning projects, using JavaScript and Python
This bot was made using a feed forward neural net implemented and trained with PyTorch.
This bot was built using mainly Python, with the training and machine learning done in PyTorch and API built in Flask.

Currently I am working as a Software Developer. In the past I worked as a Business Analyst where my responsibilities revolve mainly around project management duties and writing requirements documents.

I have experience as both a Software Developer and a Business Analyst, which gives me insight on both sides of the software development process. I have wrote both software to meet requirements and requirements for another developer to use.

I graduated recently from Simon Fraser University with a Joint Degree in Computing Science and Business. I also have the Business Analystics and Decision Making Certificate from the Beedie School of Business.
A strength of mine is problem solving, and being able to look for the information I need. Often times I am given minimal information, and I am left on my own to figure out a solution to a problem.
A strength of mine is ebing able to look for the right information. Most of what I know as a software developer is self taught, gained through reading online resources and documentations.
A weakness of mine is overconfidence in my abilities. Sometimes I find myself taking on more work than I can handle. I try to improve on this by constantly reevaluating my skills and abilities.
A weakness of mine is pushing myself to take on challenging tasks. This is fine when working as an individual contributor, but in a team it can be detrimental to other people's work.
